fr.liglab.adele.icasa.application
Interface ContextualStateVariable

All Superinterfaces:
StateVariable
public interface ContextualStateVariable
extends StateVariable

Represents a variable which either its value or its definition is related to an application.

Author:
Thomas Leveque
